last_episode_to_air.name: It's Time
last_episode_to_air.overview: In a final showdown with George Zax, Billy and Patty seek justice for the victims of the opioid epidemic, no holds barred.

name: Goliath
overview: Once a powerful lawyer, Billy McBride is now burned out and washed up, spending more time in a bar than a courtroom. When he reluctantly agrees to pursue a wrongful death lawsuit against the biggest client of Cooperman & McBride, the massive law firm he helped create, Billy and his ragtag team uncover a vast and deadly conspiracy, pitting them all in a life or death trial against the ultimate Goliath.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In season two, Billy McBride returns to defend a 16-year-old boy accused of a grisly double homicide. Billy, Patty and team fervently build their case in the seedy underworld of LA, squaring off with a dirty cop, a ruthless drug lord and a prosecutor to prove the boy's innocence. As the true culprits come to light, the implications reach as far as the mayoral race and the city's preeminent billionaire developer.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In season 3, the unexpected death of an old friend leads Billy McBride to take a case in the drought-stricken Central Valley where he comes face-to-face with a new Goliath: a billionaire rancher and his sister. As Billy and his team pursue the truth, old enemies and personal demons resurface, forcing him to confront his own mortality.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: In the final season, Billy returns to his Big Law roots after Patty takes a job at a prestigious white-shoe law firm in San Francisco. Together, they try to take down one of America’s most insidious Goliaths: the opioid industry. As Billy deals with his own chronic pain and Patty can’t shake the feeling she’s being used, they will test each other’s loyalty like never before.

episodes.name: Of Mice and Men
episodes.overview: A burned-out attorney gets a second chance for redemption when he agrees to pursue a wrongful death lawsuit against the biggest client of his former law firm.

episodes.name: Pride and Prejudice
episodes.overview: Billy scrambles to get his wrongful death lawsuit into court by any means necessary.

episodes.name: Game On
episodes.overview: The judge gives Billy only a day to make a compelling offer of proof before he dismisses the lawsuit.

episodes.name: It's Donald
episodes.overview: The beginning of discovery unearths a startling new piece of evidence that threatens to unravel Billy's entire theory of the case.

episodes.name: Cover Your Ass
episodes.overview: As both sides begin their depositions, more secrets start to come to the surface, threatening to destroy everyone involved.

episodes.name: Line of Fire
episodes.overview: Billy has to go to great lengths to secure his physical evidence's safety and preserve his witnesses' credibility.

episodes.name: Beauty and the Beast
episodes.overview: With danger mounting around every corner, Billy has to decide whether to head directly to trial or take his chances with a continuance.

episodes.name: Citizens United
episodes.overview: The trial concludes as former partners and old friends have their final showdown in court.

episodes.name: La Mano
episodes.overview: Billy McBride is reluctantly pulled back into criminal defense when his friend's 16- year-old son is arrested for a double murder.

episodes.name: Politics
episodes.overview: After a brutal loss, Billy decides to formally take on Julio Suarez's defense but, before he can go back to court, he must get his team back together.

episodes.name: Fresh Flowers
episodes.overview: When Billy learns the name of the real shooter, he has to turn to the FBI to help him bring his elusive suspect in for questioning.

episodes.name: Alo
episodes.overview: Billy tries a risky strategy to suppress the prosecution's two key pieces of evidence, hoping he can clear Julio's name before trial even begins.

episodes.name: Who's Gabriel
episodes.overview: Billy finally gets a witness who can exonerate Julio, but he won't talk unless Billy can convince the prosecutor to give him a deal.

episodes.name: Two Cinderellas
episodes.overview: Believing his client will soon be a free man, Billy joins Marisol for a romantic weekend in Mexico, only for his case to fall apart at home.

episodes.name: Diablo Verde
episodes.overview: Held hostage by strangers and with no memory of how he got there, Billy has to make a harrowing escape from Mexico.

episodes.name: Tongue Tied
episodes.overview: On the night of the mayoral election, Billy and his team race to take down the people responsible before they become an unstoppable Goliath.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In season two, Billy McBride returns to defend a 16-year-old boy accused of a grisly double homicide. Billy, Patty and team fervently build their case in the seedy underworld of LA, squaring off with a dirty cop, a ruthless drug lord and a prosecutor to prove the boy's innocence. As the true culprits come to light, the implications reach as far as the mayoral race and the city's preeminent billionaire developer.

episodes.name: The Subsidence Adventure
episodes.overview: The unexpected death of an old friend takes Billy McBride to California’s Central Valley, where a record drought has made water more valuable than human life.

episodes.name: Happiness from the Ground Up
episodes.overview: Billy’s investigation into the Central Valley’s water problem threatens the launch of Diana Blackwood’s almond-based lifestyle brand.

episodes.name: Good Morning, Central Valley
episodes.overview: As Billy and Patty begin a class action lawsuit against the corporate farmers, the Blackwoods start dealing with everyone who gets in their way, including Billy.

episodes.name: Full Circle
episodes.overview: Flashing back to before the events of the season, Billy has a drunken weekend at the Rising Sun Hotel and Casino, crossing paths with the Blackwoods and their scheme to steal water.

episodes.name: Argus 2: Battledome
episodes.overview: As Billy and Patty make their first appearance in court, their class action is threatened when they walk into traps set for them by the Blackwoods.

episodes.name: Fer-De-Lance
episodes.overview: Billy and Patty grill the Blackwoods in their depositions, shining a light on their complicated relationship and how they obtained ownership of the county’s water supply.

episodes.name: Conscious Uncoupling
episodes.overview: Billy puts Wade Blackwood on the stand and under oath, forcing him to admit every detail of his scheme to steal the state’s water.

episodes.name: Joy Division
episodes.overview: As Billy and Patty close in on the Blackwoods, Wade tries to cover up their crimes while Diana makes one final, desperate play, regardless who gets in her way.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In season 3, the unexpected death of an old friend leads Billy McBride to take a case in the drought-stricken Central Valley where he comes face-to-face with a new Goliath: a billionaire rancher and his sister. As Billy and his team pursue the truth, old enemies and personal demons resurface, forcing him to confront his own mortality.

episodes.name: Hadleyville
episodes.overview: Billy returns to his Big Law roots after Patty takes a job at a prestigious white-shoe law firm in San Francisco. Together, they try to take down one of America’s most insidious Goliaths: the opioid industry.

episodes.name: The Pain Killer
episodes.overview: Patty finds herself on the hook for Billy’s behavior as he digs deeper into the case.

episodes.name: Signed, William Hamilton McBride
episodes.overview: As Billy and Sam grow closer, he discovers that the opioid industry is keeping bigger secrets than he ever imagined.

episodes.name: Forcibly Removed
episodes.overview: Billy goes to extremes to keep the case alive, and Sam questions whether bringing him on board was a good idea after all.

episodes.name: Spilt Milk
episodes.overview: As Billy faces repercussions from his conduct, he is forced into a truce with an old adversary.

episodes.name: Rundleworks
episodes.overview: Billy and Patty take measures to protect a witness, while the partners at Margolis & True scramble to strengthen their case.

episodes.name: Lawyer Trickery Bullshit
episodes.overview: When Patty calls a surprise witness to the stand, the defense does everything they can to undermine the witness’s credibility.

episodes.name: It's Time
episodes.overview: In a final showdown with George Zax, Billy and Patty seek justice for the victims of the opioid epidemic, no holds barred.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: In the final season, Billy returns to his Big Law roots after Patty takes a job at a prestigious white-shoe law firm in San Francisco. Together, they try to take down one of America’s most insidious Goliaths: the opioid industry. As Billy deals with his own chronic pain and Patty can’t shake the feeling she’s being used, they will test each other’s loyalty like never before.
